name: Doom Elemental
description: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned (from your Hand) by sending "Fire Elemental", "Thunder Elemental", and "Water Elemental" from your Hand or Field to the GY and cannot be Special Summon in any other way. You can tribute this card; Special Summon "Fire Elemental", "Thunder Elemental", and "Water Elemental" from your GY.
